name: Death Was An Error
description:
This is the prototype for a multiplayer survival game.

3/6/2021: For now, you can only walk in a small landscape ... Oh, yes! You can do it together with your friends!

To start playing you need:

- For the host: click the "Start Host" button in the upper left corner.

- For the player: click the "Find Server" button in the upper left corner and if the result is positive, you will see the ip of the servers that can be accessed.

Don't forget to leave your comment, I really appreciate it. Should I continue with the project? What would you like to see?
